name: Save the Dill town
description:
This is a game where you need to save the Dill town 

This game is made by one person (me) and the characters are from the discord server 

that im in, named the Dill server 

and there is some sexual content in it but there is no nudity 

and if you are sensitive to rape and loli content then you should not play this game.

None of the events in the game are real.

You should not take this game very seriously.

This game was made by me in a week
